Build daily curves into ldata object from ESIOS data

Source: R/esios2lfdata.R
esios2lfdata.Rd

Fetches ESIOS time-series for a specified resolution and date range via esios2df(), then assembles a single ldata list: common metadata (daily index, date, leap, dst) plus one fdata per variable with daily curves.

Usage

esios2lfdata(
  var_names,
  start_date,
  end_date,
  api_key,
  resolution = c("1min", "5min", "10min", "15min", "30min", "hour", "1hour", "4hour",
    "1day"),
  verbose = FALSE
)

Arguments

var_names

Character vector of indicator names in "ShortName_ID" format.

start_date

String "YYYY-MM-DD" interval start (Europe/Madrid).

end_date

String "YYYY-MM-DD" interval end (Europe/Madrid).

api_key

Your ESIOS API key.

resolution

Character: one of "1min","5min","10min","15min","30min", "hour","1hour","4hour","1day".

verbose

Logical; if TRUE, prints progress messages.

Value

A ldata list: element df is a data.frame (index, date, leap, dst), followed by each variable as a daily fdata object.
